DOC.brief_summary: Background : In international randomise control trial study patient self-reported symptom improve either stapled anopexy operation diathermy excision haemorrhoid . Methods : The study involve 18 hospital Sweden , Denmark UK . Two hundred seven patient randomise . After exclusion 27 patient , 90 group operate follow one year . Patients provide self-reported symptom surgery 1 year . A patient diary obtain daily self-reported postoperative pain score ( VAS ) . Surgeons evaluate anal anatomy surgery 1 year .
DOC.brief_title: Symptom Control 1-year After Circular Stapler Anopexy Diathermy Excision Prolapsed Haemorhoids
DOC.criteria: Grades III IV haemorrhoids Previous operation high anal fistula injury anal sphincteres
